snippet: Many top editors say that stolen documents are fair game for coverage when they’re newsworthy, but others argue that such coverage only helps hackers....
lead_paragraph: Many top editors say that stolen documents are fair game for coverage when they’re newsworthy, but others argue that such coverage only helps hackers.

headline.main: Editors Defend Coverage of Stolen Emails After News of Russian Hacks
headline.print_headline: Editors Defend Coverage of Stolen Emails After Revelations of Russian Hacking
